function.name: media_stop
function.description: This function is used to stop media playback on a specified SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to stop media playback.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to stop media playback.

appname.description: The name of the application that is currently playing.

title.description: The title of the media that is currently playing.

cast.description: The cast of the media that is currently playing.
